name: Baldi is broken
description:
Baldi… is broken! If you don't believe me, just press Y or N in the pause menu and see what happens! Baldi's BrOkEn, Audio is messed up, the YCTP is BrOkEn, Items are BrOkEn, even just getting notebooks and characters are BrOkEn! Just don't type 99 in the YCTP, you shouldn't even think about doing that...

Also I guess baldi got a suntan
